name: Diamond Diver
description:
Short game idea made for Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #4 inspired by the Beginner module from the Game Dev Unlocked course.

Use WASD or direction keys to move.

Collect gem stones for points, and potion bottles to replenish health. Avoid barrels, cannonballs, and bombs (and the surprise visitor!). See how many points you can get without drowning!

All assets from the Pirate Pack by Synty Studios.

Music from the Ambient Puzzle Music/SFX Pack by Chris Logsdon.
